Zoom Video Communications , CrowdStrike Holdings , and Dick's Sporting Goods all report on Tuesday. Campbell Soup goes next on Wednesday, followed by Slack Technologies, Broadcom , Gap, and J.M. Smucker on Thursday. The economic data highlight of the week will be Friday's May jobs report. The Bureau of Labor Statistics is expected to report a decrease of 8 million nonfarm payrolls, after April's record 20.5 million decline. The unemployment rate is seen rising to 19.5%. Other ...
